thread.title: Stafford Gatehouse to stage Snow Dragon
thread.title_full: Stafford Gatehouse to stage Snow Dragon

title: Stafford Gatehouse to stage Snow Dragon
text:
The production features storytelling, comedy and songs suitable for children over three. The Snow Dragon will at the MET Studio on October 30 and 31 at 11am and 2pm. 
Tickets are £8.50 and can be booked by calling 01785 619080 or by clicking here . Receive daily email updates from the Express & Star 
We'll send a morning digest of the day's biggest news and sport stories straight to your inbox. Email Address
